text: hananimkkeseo neohui jasindeul-e gwanhan yeleul deusyeossnola neohui oleunson i soyuhago issneun jadeul gaundeseo uliga neohuiege bepun il-yonghal yang sig-e dongdeunghage bunbaebad-eul jaga iss neunyo neohuiga seololeul dulyeowo hadeus neohuineun dulyeowo haneunyo ileohge ha yeo hananim-eun ihaehaneun baegseong-eul wi hae malsseum-eul bunmyeongke hanola
